description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Kill blocks, save the world!  Block Killer is what 1980 thought we'd be playing in 2010.  Classic, single stick movement, simple push button shooting.  Over 30 levels of arcade-style action!  Do you have what it takes?
